entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:27 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -37.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 12:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -37.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -41.5°C
Wind: SSE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. Temperature falling to minus 40 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 40 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clear. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 58 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
